name: Occupation Force
description:
They've got us surrounded again, the poor bastards.
-General Creighton Abrams

Occupation force is a light hearted 2D RTS/tower defense hybrid with a minimalist feel wrapped in a beautiful, modern pixel art aesthetic.

Play the role of the commander of a forsaken firebase in the middle of nowhere in Vietnam and fight for survival in a procedurally generated battlefield. Collect supplies that are airdropped in your area of operations and task your patrols to find the elusive enemy. Use the terrain to your advantage and quickly disrupt your enemies before they build tunnels and other structures in order to facilitate their final assault.
